Description:
Detects shellshock expressions in log files

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Shellshock Expression
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%(){:;};%' or log like '%() {:;};%' or log like '%() { :;};%' or log like '%() { :; };%')
